sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Region from "./region" const Covid =()=>{ const [data, setData] = useState([]); const getdata = async () =>{ try{ const res= await fetch('https://api.rootnet.in/covid19-in/stats/latest'); const adata = await res.json(); console.log(adata['data']['summary']); setData(adata['data']['summary']); }catch(err){ console.log(err); } } useEffect(() =>{ getdata(); },[]); return( <>

our Country

India

confirmedCasesForeign

{data.confirmedCasesForeign}

confirmedCasesIndian

{data.confirmedCasesIndian}

deaths

{data.deaths}

discharged

{data.discharged}

total

{data.total}

) } export default Covid
